predicate.note: Frames file for 'digest' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: chew 100 times before swallowing
example.text: After *trace* thoroughly digesting reams of information, he often concludes that more data are needed, and when he finally decides to act, his movements sometimes seem excrutiatingly small.

example.name: passive
example.text: But once the new securities are digested *trace*, they expect investors to focus on the weak economic data.
